projects.name: V-Tube Video System
projects.description: Backend for a streaming platform with AI-powered title & thumbnail generation using Gemini API. Built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Cloudinary.

projects.name: Maze Runner Visualizer
projects.description: A* pathfinding and recursive maze generation visualizer with 60fps performance using Canvas API. Features multiple algorithms and customizable grid sizes.

projects.name: AWS Cloud Architecture
projects.description: Secure, high-availability architecture with global CDN distribution and SSL. Implemented VPC, load balancing, and auto-scaling for production workloads.

projects.name: Swiggy-Like Delivery App
projects.description: Full-stack food delivery platform with real-time order tracking, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built during MERN Stack internship in 2022.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern, accessible portfolio with custom animations, dark mode, and full responsiveness. Features GSAP animations, custom cursor, and keyboard navigation.

projects.name: REST API Aggregator
projects.description: Microservices-based API gateway that aggregates multiple third-party APIs with rate limiting, caching, and authentication middleware.
